mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, CONTAINERNUMBER, FTCBM, ARRIVALPERIOD, LCLTIME, OUTPORTTIME, TOWAREHOUSETIME, INWAREHOUSETIME, CREATEDATE, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, OPER, PACKAGEINGLIST, EXPRESSID, CHECKTIME, TOPURPOSEPORTTIME, RECEIPT, EXPRESSTYPE, TRANSPORTFARE, POSITION, CONTENT, OPERTYPE, CONTAINERINFO from db_lcllog where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, CONTAINERNUMBER, FTCBM, ARRIVALPERIOD, LCLTIME, OUTPORTTIME, TOWAREHOUSETIME, INWAREHOUSETIME, CREATEDATE, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, OPER, PACKAGEINGLIST, EXPRESSID, CHECKTIME, TOPURPOSEPORTTIME, RECEIPT, EXPRESSTYPE, TRANSPORTFARE, POSITION, CONTENT, OPERTYPE, CONTAINERINFO from db_lcllog
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , CONTAINERNUMBER , FTCBM , ARRIVALPERIOD , LCLTIME , OUTPORTTIME , TOWAREHOUSETIME , INWAREHOUSETIME , CREATEDATE , CREATEOPER , OPERTIME , OPER , PACKAGEINGLIST , EXPRESSID , CHECKTIME , TOPURPOSEPORTTIME , RECEIPT , EXPRESSTYPE , TRANSPORTFARE , POSITION , CONTENT , OPERTYPE , CONTAINERINFO

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CONTAINERNUMBER = #{containernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FTCBM = #{ftcbm,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ARRIVALPERIOD = #{arrivalperiod,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
LCLTIME = #{lcltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
OUTPORTTIME = #{outporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
TOWAREHOUSETIME = #{towarehousetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
INWAREHOUSETIME = #{inwarehousetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PACKAGEINGLIST = #{packageinglist,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EXPRESSID = #{expressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
TOPURPOSEPORTTIME = #{topurposeporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RECEIPT = #{receipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EXPRESSTYPE = #{expresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TRANSPORTFARE = #{transportfare,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CONTAINERINFO = #{containerinfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

PACKAGEINGLIST = #{packageinglist,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
EXPRESSID = #{expressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,

, 1=1
